term.title: photoacoustic detector

item.text: A pressure-sensitive detector used to detect intermittent radiation absorbed in a black body or in the sample concerned. The resulting rapid temperature change produces a transient pressure oscillation that is observed with the help of a microphone, or a piezoelectric device.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1745. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-XI. Detection of radiation (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1752 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567101745)
